DAQ¶

class daq.DAQAnalogInputVoltages(name: str, task: Any, samples_to_read: int, shape: Sequence[int], **kwargs) → None[source]¶

Acquires data from one or several DAQ analog inputs.

get_raw()[source]¶

Averages data to get self.target_points points per channel. If self.target_points == self.samples_to_read, no averaging is done.

class daq.DAQAnalogInputs(name: str, dev_name: str, rate: Union[int, float], channels: Dict[str, int], task: Any, clock_src: Union[str, NoneType] = None, samples_to_read: Union[int, NoneType] = 2, target_points: Union[int, NoneType] = None, **kwargs) → None[source]¶

Instrument to acquire DAQ analog input data in a qcodes Loop or measurement.

clear_instances()[source]¶

Clear instances of DAQAnalogInputs Instruments.
